channel.title: Software on Nathaniel Saul | Around About
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Nathaniel Saul | Around About

item.title: Kepler Mapper
item.description: I actively maintain Kepler Mapper, a popular Python library for creating and visualizing Mappers. We provide a scikit-learn style API that is intuitive and approachable for data scientists and machine learning researchers. Try it out: pip install kmapper

item.title: Persim
item.description: I developed and maintain Persim, a library for computing persistence images of persistence diagrams.

item.title: Ripser
item.description: I help maintain the Python wrapper for Ripser. My contribution have been dev-ops focused, spending most of my time on building intuitive Python interface, visualization functionality, deployment and packaging, and automated testing and continuous integration.
